version_description:
New Heroes, new weapons, new perks and new features! Your world is getting bigger in The Walking Dead: Our World.

New Features -
Talents & Mods: You’ll now find Talent and Mod tokens in selected reward crates. Use these tokens to power up y

SOLO MISSIONS
Players will now find Solo Missions on the map screen. By completing these missions you’ll earn XP, Gold and along the way find Heroes to fight by your side. Fight Walkers, save the living and tell your story.

CARD RARITY COLORS CH

What’s New in Our World?

Building Revamp Continues
● Timer of Buildings now last for 10 days at all Levels. Timer is reset when the building is upgraded
● Gold cost for upgrading Buildings has been reduced by 50%

New Hero, Weapons and

Changes to missions and rewards
● New solo missions in the early levels
● Adjustments to when content shows on the map while moving fast
● Legendary Rick is now a guaranteed reward for completing the third group board
Changes to Heroes and wea

Fear The Living - Raiders
Raiders join the battle for Our World. Fight against an enemy who fires back
Winning Raider Battles can reward with weapons, including a set of Sniper Rifles never before seen in Our World

The Walking Dead: Our World is out now across the globe!  Grab your friends, get your gear ready and get out and battle the Walking Dead. On the Couch, on the streets, where ever you like; explore your world, take back your city and unite with fellow surv

Grab your friends, get your gear ready and get out and battle the Walking Dead! The update includes many bug fixes and improvements to make Our World a smoother experience!
Grab your friends, get your gear ready and get out and battle the Walking Dead! The update includes many bug fixes and improvements to make Our World a smoother experience!

What’s New in Update 1.2:

Bait
Attract Walkers to your location and take down as many as you can! Grab your companion, place a bait and get ready for the battle of a lifetime.
Place a Bait and players in your area can compete to see who can t

Weekly Board Revamp
We’ve added another Tier of three Boards between Boards 10 and 11. This will not change the Board Tier that your Group is currently on, but you might notice that the difficulty of the tiles on each Board has changed.

Season 9 missions
Get ready for The Walking Dead Season 9 with special missions in-game every week after the new episodes air on TV.

What's new in 7.2?
The final weeks of the 'Fear the Living' Season are upon us, and now comes the ultimate challenge: Raider Bases! Take down the Raider strongholds to unlock a new Hero: The Governor!

Coming Soon
Brand new Events and Missions

What's new in 8.0?
With the end of a dynasty, Kingdom Come, a new season is about to begin – Heroes Unite!

New Season
Heroes Unite Season is here with revamped Boards!

What’s new in 8.1?

Celebrate Halloween in The Walking Dead: Our World with the week-long 'Rick or Treat' event, and welcome a new Hero – the first of three winners of the Become A Hero competition!

This update introduces reworked Daily Missions, adds Weekly Missions and paves the way for the Season Pass to Our World!

What’s new in 10.0?
Whispers in a herd? Could that be a new enemy type? Lucky there’s a new weapon class on the way!

Coming soon, among other surprises, we welcome a new Hero – the second of three winners of the Become A Hero competition!

What's new in 11.0?
This update brings the long-requested adjustment to Consumables Caps, as well as multiple bug fixes!

Coming Soon:
Brand new Events, as well as the release of new Legendary & Epic Heroes, and a Rare Bow!

This update brings some bug fixes.

What's new in 12.0?
This update brings bug fixes and performance improvements.

What’s new in 13.0?
This update adds Daily & Weekly Mission progress to the post-combat screen, and a first look at the brand new feature, Free Roam, which allows you to explore the map without leaving home.

Brand new Events

What’s new in 14.0?
This update adds 3 new Chapters to the Storyline Missions, and multiple bug fixes and performance improvements.
